revision.text:
'''Spawn numbers''' are the numbers used by specials such as [[Thing_Spawn]] to spawn [[Classes|actors]] in the game once the user has started playing the map.
Note: Contrarily to the other games supported by ZDoom, [[Strife]] doesn't make much use of spawn numbers. Most {{Class|Strife}} actors do not have an associated spawn number, and ZDefs.acs doesn't contain identifier constants so here class names are used instead.
{{Class|ClipOfBullets}} 11 {{Class|LeatherArmor}} 68 {{Class|MetalArmor}} 69 {{Class|EnergyPod}} 75 {{Class|ShadowArmor}} 135 {{Class|EnvironmentalSuit}} 136 {{Class|StrifeMap}} 137 {{Class|BoxOfBullets}} 139 {{Class|MiniMissiles}} 140 {{Class|CrateOfMissiles}} 141 {{Class|EnergyPack}} 142 {{Class|AmmoSatchel}} 144
[[Doom spawn numbers]] | [[Heretic spawn numbers]] | [[Hexen spawn numbers]] [[Category:Editing references]]
